root.title: saudi french bank doubl pai capit
root.body: al bank al saudi al fransu also know saudi french will doubl pai capit 400 mln riyal 200 mln convert reserv equiti bank offici sai jeddah base saudi french 40 pct banqu indosuez 60 pct saudi public will sign technic servic agreement indosuez riyadh tuesdai manag bank next five year sai offici sai increas pai capit doubl number share hold sharehold will add depth market extend trade investor
